## PR Checklist

Please ensure the following items are completed before requesting review:

- [ ] **Linted** - Code has been formatted and linted (run `pre-commit run --all-files` or `ruff check` and `black`)
- [ ] **Updated unit tests** - New or updated tests cover the changes (run `pytest -q`)
- [ ] **Updated changelog** - If applicable, added entry to CHANGELOG or release notes
- [ ] **Integration testing** - Verified the changes work correctly with the full system/CLI
